profile.description: Backend developer, applied, passionate, willing to learn and get ahead being of benefit to the company. I have a better development in applications or Desktop programs. The technologies that I currently dominate the most are Java, C#, Springboot and Flutter. As for Database I have knowledge about SQLServer, PostgresSQL and MySQL.

hobbies.first-hobbie-description: I am fascinated by the fact of riding a bicycle, this being a means of transport that is good for the environment and for health.

experience.first-job-title: Front End and Back End Developer - Intern (Sudamericana de Software)
experience.first-job-description: Intern of the South American Software company where I was trained in the necessary technologies to be able to get the maximum potential in the requirements that are requested. Among those HTML, CSS, JavaScript, APIs in Springboot and .NET.
experience.second-job-description: Survey personnel for the collection of information according to the stratum and sampling requested. Surveys at national level in various provinces of Ecuador. Among them Guayas, El Oro, Santa Elena.
experience.third-job-tipe: Experience in Product Sales and Consulting
experience.third-job-description: Commercial advisor of the business, with the positions of handling Point of Sale and dispatch, providing the customer with a personalized attention according to their needs.
experience.fourth-job-description: Junior Full Stack Developer in technologies such as .NET Framework, React.js, SQLServer, Flask, Flutter.

projects.first-projects-description: Website created to publicize my experiences, work, studies, knowledge, forms of contact to companies or people interested in hiring my services.
projects.second-projects-description: Web page made to consume APIs for a better communication of the Backend and Frontend with the Database.
